name: Penguin Slide (Erk)
description:
Penguin Slide is a quirky idea I got, so I created a simple prototype. It currently contains three simple levels. The idea is to add some more challanging levels and also include some new features, such as threats, timed-events and more!

I'm very excited to see what people have to say about the game, so please do drop a comment if you decide to try it out. :)

Controls

W, A, S, D 
Be aware, the controls are a bit slippery.
